title: Replace payment QR, remove login icon/button, and update post-payment confirmation message

requirements.text: Replace the payment QR image displayed in the Payment Section with the user-provided uploaded QR image, keeping the app’s existing static asset path `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` (i.e., update the file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png`).
acceptanceCriteria: The QR shown in the payment UI matches the uploaded QR image.
The QR image is loaded from `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` and no backend image serving is introduced.
No code changes are required to reference a different QR path (only the asset file is replaced).

requirements.text: Remove the Login/Logout icon/button from the landing page header UI (currently rendered in `frontend/src/App.tsx`) so it is not visible to users.
acceptanceCriteria: The header no longer renders the Login/Logout button and related icons (e.g., LogIn/LogOut).
The rest of the landing page layout remains intact and functional (offer details, urgency banner, form, payment flow).

requirements.text: After the user clicks the “I Have Paid” button and the app transitions to the confirmation screen, display this exact English message prominently: “You will get access within 10 mins after checking your payment details”. Update the existing confirmation copy in `frontend/src/components/PaymentConfirmation.tsx` accordingly.

quotes: AFTER I PAID BUTTON IT WILL SHOW YOU WILL GET ACCESS WITHIN 10 MINS AFTER CHECKING YOUR PAYMENT DETAILS

acceptanceCriteria: After a successful `markAsPaid` action, the confirmation screen displays the exact sentence: “You will get access within 10 mins after checking your payment details”.
The message is user-facing and clearly visible without needing to expand/click anything.
No other user-facing text contradicts the 10-minute access expectation.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Keep the payment QR loaded as a static frontend asset; do not add backend image hosting.
nonGoals: Changing backend payment/submission logic (`markAsPaid`, renewal date computation, urgency slots).
Adding new authentication methods or third-party login providers.
Implementing real payment verification; the confirmation remains based on the existing “I Have Paid” user action.

edits: Replace the QR image content with the uploaded QR (payment-qr.dim_512x512.png > payment-qr.dim_512x512.png)
